Package io.micronaut.guides.core

Class GuidesOption

java.lang.Object
io.micronaut.guides.core.GuidesOption
@Introspected public class GuidesOption extends Object
GuidesOption is a class that encapsulates the options for a guide, including the build tool, programming language, and test framework.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructs a new GuidesOption with the specified build tool, language, and test framework.
